video_title: People Get This Wrong About Depression - Dr.Julie #shorts
transcript:
i'm a psychologist and here's three
things people get wrong about depression
number one depression is not just about
feeling flat and low in mood lots of
people don't realize that it's common to
experience lots of anxiety when you're
depressed
number two depression is not just
psychological it's also physical so
sometimes the first thing you notice can
be a lack of energy or aches and pains
that just don't seem to have a clear
course and number three depression and
sadness are not the same thing sadness
is just one of the many symptoms of
depression and while sadness can pass in
a moment
depression can stay for years
